body:
“After” movie cast…

So the guy who acts as Hardin Scott in this 18+ “After” movie is actually the same guy who plays Tom Riddle (aka, young Voldemort) in the Harry Potter series?

Avada KaDAFUQ?!

summary:
POSSIBLE THINGS YOU’D BE GETTING THIS WEEK OR IN THE NEXT ONE PLEASE SEND ME INSPO
• can i stay? part two !!!
• blame the first...
body:
POSSIBLE THINGS YOU’D BE GETTING THIS WEEK OR IN THE NEXT ONE PLEASE SEND ME INSPO

• can i stay? part two !!!

• blame the first part two, find me love part three, everything i’m not part three

• based on this :’’’) request i got this morning!! — HI I LOVE U can I request a fic?? maybe where yn and harry are kinda mad at each other but they have a party that night and she gets WASTED and then harry gets worried about her and makes sure she’s okay? because he knows that when they fight she forgets to eat and he knows that it’s bad to drink on. An empty stomach. And yeah it just ends with them not mad anymore lol — The Love We Have

• “you’d never be too much.” — angsty/fluffy thing based on sunflower (the into the spider-verse soundtrack)!!

• the og thing of y/n being a bit much for harry,,, in other terms,,, the clingy imagine but with a twist

• long blurb with y/n being short on clothes and harry having an abundance of them and they’re neighbors and they help each other out then angst then fluff then a tiny bit of smut ahshshsha

title: Shutter
body:
Chapter Fifteen

Two weeks passed. Two whole weeks since Harry walked out her door. Elle was drowning. She couldn’t breathe without him. She couldn’t breathe knowing she was so disposable – that she meant next…

Read more…

blog.name: womanwiththeredrose

summary: Does the boyfriend jacket look lighter????? Or is it just the lighting. Bc i want it to be the bf jacket so bad lol
question: Does the boyfriend jacket look lighter????? Or is it just the lighting. Bc i want it to be the bf jacket so bad lol
answer:
I had to do some digging for this question and I’m pretty sure it’s definitely the same jacket. Harry was photographed wearing this jacket:

Then we had Louis wearing this jacket

which looks to be the same jacket not only because it simply looks the same, but because it also has six snaps, and the same snap flap thingy at the bottom:

And he just kept wearing it. It’s been years and he still wears the same jacket.

We know for sure this is the same jacket because of these two rips (that became full holes over time) in the left sleeve:

Now, color-wise, I would expect the jacket to be much lighter now; it’s several years old and clearly been worn a lot considering the holes in the sleeve, so I’m not surprised it faded over time.

The only thing I am unsure about is that the collar looks longer in the picture of Harry than in the pictures of Louis, but it could be the way it was photographed.

Whether this is for sure the same jacket or not, it is clear that this particular jacket holds some significance for Louis, since he has kept it all these years and continues to wear it.

summary: During Dalton's last performances on XF he's been giving permission to rummage through Harry's wardrobe. Sparkly clothes,...
body:
During Dalton’s last performances on XF he’s been giving permission to rummage through Harry’s wardrobe. Sparkly clothes, sparkly heeled boots and sheer shirts.

I’m joking of course… But you can’t deny his outfits screams Harry.

body:
A little ‘update’ update

Hello everybody,

Firstly I want to appologize for my inactive behaviour. But school has been a pain and I have been really focussing on that.

Right now I am in Frankfurt with school and there is no wifi so uodating won’t happen this week.

But I promise to start updating again next week!

Thank you so much for your patience and I love you all so much!

-Emma
